welcome_message_body: Welcome to Staten Island, where you'll find a perfect blend of city charm and natural beauty. Known for its stunning views of the Manhattan skyline and the iconic Staten Island Ferry, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our vibrant city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Tommys Tavern + Tap
restaurants.description: Tommys Tavern + Tap is a gastropub located in Staten Island.

restaurants.name: Holy Schnitzel
restaurants.description: Holy Schnitzel is a restaurant located in Staten Island.

restaurants.name: Panera Bread
restaurants.description: Panera Bread is a bakery located in Staten Island.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport is exclusively for private flights and offers VIP services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving mainly United Airlines flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport. No password required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Teterboro Airport is exclusively for private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Terminal A is the smallest terminal at LaGuardia Airport and primarily serves domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B is the largest terminal at LaGuardia Airport and serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Terminal C is the newest terminal at LaGuardia Airport and serves primarily domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport is used for private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.
